hero.descr: We create unforgettable itineraries tailored to your interests and preferences

welcome.descr1: Welcome to our DYNASTY Destination Management Company in China! We offer you unique and exciting journeys that will allow you to discover this amazing country.
welcome.descr2: From ancient temples and rich culture to modern metropolises and stunning natural landscapes, we create unforgettable itineraries tailored to your interests and preferences. Trust our professionalism and local expertise to make your trip to China truly special. Dive into a new adventure with us and create memories that will last a lifetime!

carousel.title: Recommended Destinations
carousel.descr: We offer many popular tourist destinations in China. Here are some of the most well-known. These destinations offer unique cultural, historical, and natural attractions in China.

offers.title: Offers
offers.descr: We strive to provide our clients with the best service and make their stay in China comfortable, safe, and full of bright impressions.
offers.offer1Descr: Individual and group tours to popular tourist destinations in China. Themed tours, including cultural, historical, culinary, and adventure routes. Guided excursions with professional multilingual guides.
offers.offer2Descr: Organization of business meetings, conferences, and exhibitions. Planning and hosting corporate events and team-building activities. Logistic support and technical provision for events.
offers.offer3Descr: Organization of transfers for convenient movement around the city and beyond. Purchasing railway and air tickets. VIP transportation services.
offers.offer4Descr: Selection and booking of hotels of various categories according to clients’ preferences. Arrangement of stays in traditional Chinese inns and international hotel chains.
offers.offer5Descr: Traditional Chinese performances, festivals, and shows. Organization of workshops on Chinese calligraphy, tea ceremonies, and other cultural activities. Conducting culinary tours and gastronomic workshops.
offers.offer6Descr: Hiking, trekking, and active recreation in scenic areas of China. Water sports such as rafting and river cruises. Visits to national parks and reserves.
offers.offer7Descr: Customized itineraries and programs tailored to clients' preferences and interests. 24/7 support and assistance throughout the trip. Services of personal guides and translators.
offers.offer8Descr: Arranging visits to leading medical institutions and spa centers. Programs of traditional Chinese medicine and wellness tours.
